backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a blog backend with CRUD operations for posts (create, read, update, delete) stored in a Map, tracking post metadata including title, content, author, creation time, and published status.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting four implemented features: home page with published posts list, post detail page, create post form, and editorial design styling, each mapped to specific frontend files and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON object containing one-line summaries of all frontend source files including pages, components, hooks, utilities, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining OKLCH color palette for light and dark modes, including background, foreground, primary, secondary, muted, accent, and chart colors.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with basic meta tags, title 'Simple Blog', root div, and script tag loading the React application from main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: TanStack Router configuration defining three routes (home, post detail, create post) with Layout as root component and type-safe router setup.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout component providing sticky header with logo and navigation buttons, main content outlet, and footer with copyright and caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/PostCard.tsx: Card component displaying blog post preview with title, author, date, truncated content (200 chars), and 'Read more' link with hover effects.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook managing ICP actor instance creation based on Internet Identity authentication state, with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for blog operations: fetching all published posts, fetching single post by ID, and creating/updating posts with automatic cache invalidation.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm editorial color palette for both light and dark modes, plus typography enhancements for headings using serif fonts.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient for data fetching and InternetIdentityProvider for authentication, then renders the App component.
frontend/src/pages/CreatePostPage.tsx: Page component with a form to create new blog posts, including validation for title, content, and author fields, plus a published toggle and navigation back to home.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Home page component that fetches and displays all published blog posts in reverse chronological order using PostCard components, with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/PostDetailPage.tsx: Post detail page that displays a single blog post's full content with title, author, creation date, and formatted content, retrieved by post ID from URL params.
frontend/src/utils/dateFormatter.ts: Utility function that converts backend Time type (nanoseconds) to a human-readable date string formatted as 'Month Day, Year'.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending the default theme with custom colors using OKLCH color space, custom font families (sans and serif), border radius variables, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting a simple blog website with four completed features (home page, detail page, create form, editorial design) and three pending backend-related feature requests.
